name: api-automation-playwright
description: API Test Automation Framework with Playwright and TypeScript

scripts.db:shell: docker exec -it $(docker ps -q --filter ancestor=postgres:16-alpine | head -1) psql -U testuser -d api_test_db
scripts.db:logs: docker exec -it $(docker ps -q --filter ancestor=postgres:16-alpine | head -1) psql -U testuser -d api_test_db -c 'SELECT id, test_name, method, endpoint, response_status, execution_time_ms, TO_CHAR(created_at, '"'"'HH24:MI:SS'"'"') as time FROM api_logs.api_logs ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 20;'
scripts.db:stop: docker ps -q --filter ancestor=postgres:16-alpine | xargs -r docker stop || echo 'No PostgreSQL containers running'
scripts.db:clean: docker ps -aq --filter ancestor=postgres:16-alpine | xargs -r docker rm -f || echo 'No PostgreSQL containers to clean'
